radiographic_examinations.findings: Mosaic karyotype (45XY,der(15)?t(15;21),-21 [1]/46,XY [2]) in the proband. The chromosomal karyotypes of the parents were normal.
Deletion of 22.7 Mb in the chr15q11.2q21.1 region and a 2.1 Mb deletion in the chr21q22.3 region with a copy number of about 1.5.
Copy number of the 15q11-q13 region ranged between 0.5–0.7 (normal value 0.7–1.3), indicating the presence of gene deletion mutation.
Methylation level of approximately 70% (normal value 50%), indicating partial deletion of the methylated paternal allele due to a mosaic deletion of the paternal allele.
